name: Cattack (Joer15, miko23, JhonGomez, Viet Anh Luu)
name_original: Cattack (Joer15, miko23, JhonGomez, Viet Anh Luu)
description:
Description

Play as a Ninja Cat to protect your master's dojo from being overrun by mice. Some are weak against the sword and some are weak against the Shuriken, match your attacks with the enemy's weakness to eliminate them for good.

Controls

W — Face Up
A — Face Left
S — Face Down
D — Face Right

Space — Start (start or restart the game)
Esc — Select (pause)
J — Melee Slash
K  — Throws Shuriken

Instructions

Slash your sword at this enemy

  

Throw your shuriken at this enemy
